60%+ of interpreters report burnout. You work alone with zero feedback. Skills stagnate without structured development. There's no comprehensive solution until now.

Working in isolation with no structured development path

Six integrated systems, one platform

InterpreterOS brings together everything you need to thrive not just survive in your interpreting career.

Wellbeing OS

Track emotional load, detect burnout early, and build sustainable practices with AI-guided support.

Skills OS

Visualize your competencies, practice deliberately, and close skill gaps with personalized paths.

Assignment OS

Prepare thoroughly, reflect meaningfully, and turn every assignment into a learning opportunity.

Team OS

Coordinate seamlessly with team interpreters and mentors for complex assignments.

Agency OS

For agencies: manage interpreter wellness, track development, and reduce turnover.

AI Coaching

Meet Catalyst your AI coach trained on interpreter-specific knowledge and the ECCI Model.

Official RID CEU Sponsor

Earn CEUs while you work

InterpreterOS is the only platform that IS an RID CEU Sponsor. Your reflections, skill development, and learning activities automatically count toward certification maintenance.

Built by an interpreter who’s lived it

InterpreterOS was created by Sarah Wheeler a CODA with 20+ years of interpreting experience, graduate degrees in Interpreter Pedagogy and Psychology, and an Air Force veteran.

Because she’s been in your shoes, back-to-back assignments, emotional load, and relentless logistics, Sarah built InterpreterOS to bring calm and clarity to your day, support reflective practice without the overwhelm, and help you build a sustainable career.
